Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory298.png'}
{3: 'The battle between mechanoids continues.'}
{3: 'The dull impacts of weapons can be heard all around, followed by the sound of explosions and electric surges.'}
{3: 'Even though the alarm echoes throughout the underground city, the mechanoids show no signs of stopping.'}
{3: 'Without their leaders at the command, the mechanoid battle devolves into chaos. Not that orders are necessary...'}
{3: 'When they just need to kill those that are "different."'}
{3: 'They just need to "keep fighting."'}
{3: 'For these mechanoids, it is obvious that this has been written in their underlying code.'}
{2: 'Mechanoids', 3: 'We! Need! War!'}
{2: 'Mechanoids', 3: 'To the death! To the death!'}
{2: 'Mechanoids', 3: 'To the death! To the death!'}
{2: 'Mechanoids', 3: 'Destroy! Destroy! Only our faction! Can rule the world!'}
{2: 'Mechanoids', 3: 'Destroy! Destroy! Only our faction! Can rule the world!'}
{3: 'Woosh... Woosh...'}
{3: 'Clang... Clatter... Wham... Ka-cha...'}
{3: 'Shuffle... Smack... Scratch...'}
{3: 'The battle between mechanoids continues.'}
{3: 'All of this happens as the sudden sound of the alarm causes all of you to return to your senses.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'After their "declaration" to the world, the whole world was left in shock.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Yes, after all, it was the first time that a human group declared a "break" from humanity.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'After that, even the newly integrated World Government Intelligence Agency was mobilized for this purpose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You know how it ended. They had planned for it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...It\'s amazing that they managed to put everyone in hiding before making that kind of "declaration."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'It\'s not inconceivable. Everyone knew that the School of Sapiens was preparing for something, just not that they were planning to "break" from humanity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '—At that time, humanity was booming and the Golden Age was about to usher in a paradigm shift with interstellar colonization.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "If you had announced at that time that you were going to break from humanity, I would've thought you were crazy.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...Yet they still did it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Correct. And only now did we rediscover their existence.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...Who knows if the Gray Ravens have been able to carry out their mission without any issues.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Asimov just informed me over the comms that they've gone significantly deeper underground, which has temporarily disabled remote communication.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...Are you worried about them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "There's no point in being worried.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I think we can believe 【kuroname】.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Because the commandant is a Chief from F.O.S.?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "No, because of 【kuroname】's belief in others.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Even if 【kuroname】 sees the darkness buried within this world, the commandant still manages to find one's own direction in life.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...I really have no idea how you have so much insight into others.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That's why I am the President, and you are not.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory299.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "...We've finished our investigation of the area, but something doesn't add up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "There's no sign of fighting between the mechanoids in the buildings.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But they keep moving toward somewhere deeper inside... as if they have found something.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is something in here?', 3: '58'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Judging from what we saw earlier, there may also be mechanoids similar to the "defects" here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If they are in good condition, we may be able to ask for some information about this underground city.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Prepare to move out.', 3: '61'}
